name: AKCRAM BAG - NUMBER: 01
description:
AKCRAM BAG.
Bags Number: 01

The AKCRAM BAG is a NUMBERED Unique combination of 3 fabric squares. It’s produced by partitions of Florence Ad Banners. Every Banner is an Hand-Crafted printed cotton. (FOUR COLOUR SERIGRAPHY PROCESS). 
The AKCRAM BAG can take 4 different shapes according on how you will fix the shoulder strap.
The shoulder strap is made by hight quality leather. We re-use the odd leather picked up from Vicenza Tannery. This is a part of our philosophy as well the development of the ART and CRAFT of the HUMAN WORK.

name: AKCRAM BAG - Number: 04
description:
AKCRAM BAG.
Bags Number: 04

This is a bag part of the AKCRAM installation "DIREZIONI LUNARI" exposed in Abruzzo during Summer 2009 and a picture of it will be included in the packaging of your Akcram Bag.
The AKCRAM BAG is a NUMBERED Unique combination of 3 fabric squares. It’s produced by partitions of Florence Ad Banners. Every Banner is an Hand-Crafted printed cotton. (FOUR COLOUR SERIGRAPHY PROCESS). 
The AKCRAM BAG can take 4 different shapes according on how you will fix the shoulder strap.
The shoulder strap is made by hight quality leather. We re-use the odd leather picked up from Vicenza Tannery. This is a part of our philosophy as well the development of the ART and CRAFT of the HUMAN WORK.
